Package edu.vserver.exercises.helpers

This package contains certain helper-classes to which some aspects of implementing the interfaces in edu.vserver.exercises.model can be delegated to in most situations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SimpleExerciseMaterialUploader.ExerciseMaterialUploadSuccessListener Implementors of this interface can be registered to a SimpleExerciseMaterialUploader through #registerSuccessListener(ExerciseMaterialUploadSuccessListener) registerSuccessListener().
XmlEncHelper.BeanExerciseDataWrapper<E extends ExerciseData> Implementor of this interface must be a Java-bean and know how to transform itself to represented ExerciseData-implementor and load its state from such.
 

Class Summary
ExerciseExecutionHelper<S extends SubmissionInfo> A helper-class to which a lot of functionality of an Executor -implementor can be delegated to.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection A collection of classes that can be used to give implementations that inform the user that certain aspect of the exercise-type system is not really implemented for certain exercise-type.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.NoDataExerciseDescriptor An abstract class that can be extended to get a very simple ExerciseTypeDescriptor-implementor returning more or less void-values for everything else than Executor.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.RealSimpleExerciseExecutor An abstract class that can be extended to get a very simple Executor-implementor that does not care about ExerciseData-object it receives.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.VoidExerciseData Empty implementation for the ExerciseData interface.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.VoidExerciseEditor An Editor-implementor that only has a button for saving an empty-xml-file.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.VoidExerciseXMLHandler Empty implementation for the ExerciseXMLHandler.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.VoidSubmissionData Empty implementation for the SubmissionInfo interface.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.VoidSubmissionDataStatsGiver<E extends ExerciseData,S extends SubmissionInfo> Empty implementation for the SubmissionStatisticsGiver that can be used with any implementor of the SubmissionInfo-interface.
ExerTypeVoidImplCollection.VoidSubmissionVisualizer<E extends ExerciseData,S extends SubmissionInfo> Empty implementation for the SubmissionVisualizer that can be used with any implementor of the SubmissionInfo-interface.
MutableExecutionState A mutable implementator for the ExecutionState -interface.
SaveListenerHelper<E extends ExerciseData> A simple helper class to which standard ExerciseSaveListener-handling can be delegated to.
SimpleExerciseMaterialUploader A class that can be used in Editor to allow the user of the Editor to upload files meeting certain constraints and to add them to EditorMaterialManager.
SubmitListenerHelper<S extends SubmissionInfo> A simple helper class to which standard ExerciseSaveListener-handling can be delegated to.
TestingExecutionSettings An implementor of ExecutionSettings that can be used for testing an exercise (ExerciseData-instance) in Editor
XmlEncHelper<E extends ExerciseData> If a JavaBean representation exists for a certain data model it is possible to use the XML formatting services offered by the java.beans.[ XMLDecoder | XMLEncoder ]-classes.
XMLHelper This class provides certain static-methods that are useful when implementing ExerciseXMLHandler.
 

Enum Summary
StandardSubmissionType The StandardSubmissionType.NORMAL-submission-type should be used as SubmissionType when a submission is prompted directly through the executor without Executor.askSubmit(SubmissionType) being called.
 

Package edu.vserver.exercises.helpers Description

This package contains certain helper-classes to which some aspects of implementing the interfaces in edu.vserver.exercises.model can be delegated to in most situations.
